profile:
Cipkar Epoxy is a company that was formed back in 2018 alongside a group of companies such as Cipkar Restoration on a mission to serve clients with the best concrete solutions accompanied with best customer service.

We pride ourselves on our expertise and communication skills to provide you with the best epoxy solutions and concrete polishing solutions without you being in the dark. Proudly serving customers in Cambridge, Kitchener, Waterloo, Guelph, Woodstock and Milton, we offer expertise and dedication in all our services and projects.

At Cipkar Epoxy we combine diligent work ethic and the most efficient processes to maintain the longevity of concrete while producing positive relationships with our customers.
